hero.name: Diego López Torres
hero.title: Software Engineer
hero.description: Building robust and scalable web solutions. Specialized in principles, design patterns, and clean, maintainable code.

about.title: About Me
about.intro: Software engineer from Universidad de Guadalajara with 3 years of professional experience building web applications. I focus on fullstack development, and I shine when it comes to identifying problems, finding which principle or pattern solves them, and applying them.

highlights.text: I'm happy coding, especially in Linux environments. I enjoy optimizing workflows and exploring new technologies.
I'm pragmatic in my approach to development. Most of the problems we face have already been solved and the solutions are out there—I'm passionate about researching them and adding them to my arsenal.
I'm diving into the DevOps world and agentic programming—it's not just about creating apps anymore, but also getting them to users.

achievements: Optimized a trading platform with 20,000+ active users
Reduced more than half of technical debt in an esoteric leisure project
Providing consulting on affiliate management solutions
Contributed to design and handled deployment of a mining pool proxy
Working on blockchain-integrated systems and hash power
jobs.highlights: Expertise in blockchain projects and decentralized business models

achievements: Worked on multi-industry projects: real estate, energy, and logistics
Researched and led the implementation of micro frontend solutions to modernize a legacy application
Developed 3-4 major features using micro frontend architecture over 1+ year
Built an administrative dashboard for a logistics company
Developed a package tracking system used by 15,000+ daily users
jobs.highlights: Legacy web application modernization with cutting-edge technologies and micro frontends
